title: constant DC's then leave buster warning
body:
so the last game i was just in, i was dc'd about 5 times when couldn't get back into the game at all. when i finally connected i didn't receive IP and also had to the " i agree" to the leave buster warning.

riot can you please remove this warning from my account and credit the ip i should have received as i should not be held accountable for server issues while i was playing

replies.body: Everyone is experiencing it. Dont hold your breath on Riot doing the right thing by you though.

how is stopping me from getting ip and making me sign a leave buster warning agreement riot doing the right thing to me? it's not like i was leaving the game on purpose. it was a server issue not my pc causing the issue
Yeah I know dingus, I'm saying DONT COUNT ON THEM doing the right thing. Thats what "dont hold your breath" means.
nvm lol.. the joys of being half asleep not reading the sentence correctly and adding full stops in for no apparent reason haha... i do appoligise GentlemanReptile
